attributes.action: ensure that no more public money is spent on, or diverted to, the cost of the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't know ANYONE who supports these Games coming to London so why should we pay for them or have other services reduced on their behalf?  During the period of the bid you couldn't go ANYWHERE in London without being exhorted to back it yet there seemed to be no way to OPPOSE it; almost like an "election" in a one-party state.  The cost of them should be raised by either a COMPLETELY VOLUNTARY public subscription, an extension to the Lottery Dream Ticket, or a combination of these.
